Package javax.jdo.metadata

This package contains classes representing the different components of the JDO Metadata.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
ArrayMetadata Represents details of an array in a field/property in a class.
ClassMetadata Represents a class.
CollectionMetadata Represents details of a collection in a field/property in a class.
ColumnMetadata Represents an element in a collection/array.
DatastoreIdentityMetadata Represents the datastore identity of a class.
DiscriminatorMetadata Represents the discriminator for inheritance purposes for this class.
ElementMetadata Represents an element in a collection/array.
EmbeddedMetadata Represents embedding details of a field/property in a class.
ExtensionMetadata A vendor extension defined in Metadata.
FetchGroupMetadata Represents a fetch group for a class.
FetchPlanMetadata Represents a fetch plan for a class.
FieldMetadata Represents a field in a class.
ForeignKeyMetadata Represents a FK constraint in an ORM context.
IndexMetadata Represents an index.
InheritanceMetadata Represents the inheritance of a class.
InterfaceMetadata Represents a persistent-interface.
JDOMetadata Represents the top-level JDO metadata.
JoinMetadata Represents join information.
KeyMetadata Represents a key in a map.
MapMetadata Represents details of a map in a field/property in a class.
MemberMetadata Represents a field/property in a class/persistent-interface.
Metadata This interface provides base level definitions for all metadata components.
OrderMetadata Represents ordering of a collection field/property.
PackageMetadata Represents a package within a JDOMetadata.
PrimaryKeyMetadata Represents the primary key definition of a class.
PropertyMetadata Represents a property in a class/persistent-interface.
QueryMetadata Represents a named query.
SequenceMetadata Represents a sequence.
TypeMetadata Represents a class or interface.
UniqueMetadata Represents a unique constraint.
ValueMetadata Represents a value in a map.
VersionMetadata Represents versioning of a class.
 

Enum Summary
ClassPersistenceModifier Enumeration of the persistence-modifier values for a class.
Indexed Enumeration of the indexed values.
 

Package javax.jdo.metadata Description

This package contains classes representing the different components of the JDO Metadata. It mirrors the structure of the XML schema.
